pkgmetadata.longdescription:
This manages the 99emscripten envd file and the emscripten.config file. Works like the emsdk package but the Gentoo way.
Examples for listing possible emscripten configurations:
eselect emscripten list
Examples for selecting the emscripten configurations:
eselect emscripten set 1
or
eselect emscripten "emscripten-3.1.3,llvm-14"
Examples for showing the emscripten configurations:
eselect emscripten show
